events.description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if the official closing price for Dow Jones Industrial Average (DJI) on the final trading day of January 2026 is higher than the listed price. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If the final trading day of the month is shortened (for example, due to a market-holiday schedule), the official closing price published for that shortened session will still be used for resolution.

If no official closing price is published for that session (for example, due to a trading halt into the close, system issue, or other disruption), the market will use the last valid on-exchange trade price of the regular session as the effective closing price.

The resolution source for this market is Yahoo Finance, specifically the Dow Jones Industrial Average (DJI) "Close" prices available at https://finance.yahoo.com/quote/%5EDJI/history, published under "Historical Prices."
events.title: Dow Jones Industrial Average (DJI) above ___ end of January?
